dct_title_s: Presbiteri Iohannis, sive, Abissinorum imperii descriptio
dct_description_sm: Map focused on Central and eastern Africa with relief shown pictorially. From: Theatrum orbis terrarum Abrahami Ortelii Antuerp. geographi regii ... Antuerpiæ : apud Ioannem Bapt. Vrintium, 1603. Latin text and p. no. 116 on verso.
